column4: odd problem...  i can connect to a certain ftp site with any client but can't connect with nautilus... i can also connect to any other ftp site with nautilus.  what the heck could be going on? the ftp site i am referring to uses Microsoft FTP Server (Version 4) and it's a remote machine that I don't have access to.
and how would I change that in nautilus?
this is a good question for someone that uses nautilus :)
